common.systemLanguageDetected: Detected {{language}} from your system locale. You can change it anytime.

finance.title: Current Month
finance.subtitle: Bank: {{amount}}
finance.capitalReturnsNote: Principal returned from investments (pikadon, deposits). Not counted as income but offsets investment outflows.
finance.pendingDeficit: Pending expenses will cause deficit of {{amount}}

summarySection.noIncomeAddAccounts: To track your income automatically, please add your bank account credentials. This will enable automatic income tracking and provide a complete financial overview.
summarySection.noIncomeDetected: We haven't detected any income transactions in the selected period. If you're expecting income data, please verify your most recent bank scrape was successful or run a new scrape to update your transactions.

comparison.title: Comparison Mode (Coming Soon)
comparison.description: Month-over-month comparison view is under development. This will show side-by-side metrics comparing {{current}} with {{previous}}.

empty.welcomeDescription: Let's get your finances organized. Follow these steps to start tracking your expenses and income.
empty.noTransactionsDescription: You have {{count}} transactions total, but none in the current month ({{month}}). Try scraping recent data or view historical analysis in the Analysis page.
empty.noTransactionsDisclaimer: No transactions recorded yet for {{month}}. The data shown below reflects your most recent available period.
empty.showingPreviousMonth: No transactions yet for {{currentMonth}}. Showing data from {{displayedMonth}}.

language.title: Language & locale
language.description: Default is Hebrew. On first launch we choose the closest match to your system locale; you can switch at any time.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Choose your preferred theme. System will automatically match your device's theme.

textSize.title: Text Size
textSize.description: Adjust the text size throughout the application for better readability.

diagnostics.title: Diagnostics & Crash Reports
diagnostics.description: Share anonymized crash reports to help us resolve stability issues faster. Sensitive data such as account credentials and personal identifiers are never included in crash payloads.
diagnostics.notSupported: Crash reporting is only available in the desktop app.
diagnostics.toggleOn: Crash details will be securely uploaded to our monitoring service.
diagnostics.toggleOff: Crash details remain on your device until you opt in.
diagnostics.exportHint: You can always export logs manually from the Diagnostics panel below.

chatbot.title: AI Chatbot Settings
chatbot.description: Configure your AI financial assistant and control what data it can access. The chatbot never has access to your bank credentials or passwords.
chatbot.enableHint: Show the chatbot button and allow AI assistant interactions
chatbot.permissionsDescription: Grant the chatbot access to specific data to enable personalized insights.

permissions.transactionHint: Allow access to transaction history, amounts, dates, and descriptions
permissions.categoryHint: Allow access to spending categories and categorization rules
permissions.analyticsHint: Allow access to behavioral analytics, trends, and spending patterns

chatbot.privacyBullet1: â€¢ The chatbot NEVER has access to your bank credentials or passwords
chatbot.privacyBullet2: â€¢ All permissions can be revoked at any time
chatbot.privacyBullet3: â€¢ Data is only used to answer your questions and provide insights
chatbot.privacyBullet4: â€¢ No data is shared with third parties
chatbot.noPermissions: The chatbot is enabled but has no data access permissions. Grant at least one permission for the chatbot to provide useful insights.

privacy.title: Privacy Controls
privacy.description: Toggle amount masking to obscure all financial figures across the application. Useful when sharing your screen or working in public spaces.
privacy.maskOn: All currency amounts are currently replaced with asterisks.
privacy.maskOff: Currency amounts will display their full values until masking is enabled.

profile.intro: Complete your profile for personalized insights and family financial analytics.

children.empty: No children added yet. Click the + button to add your first child.

dialog.name: Child Name
dialog.birthRequired: Birth date is required for children

privacyNote.title: Your privacy matters:
privacyNote.body: All family data is stored locally and used only for personalized insights. This information enables advanced household analytics and family financial comparisons.

messages.saveSuccess: Profile updated successfully! Your family insights will now be more comprehensive.
messages.saveError: Failed to save profile. Please try again.
messages.loadError: Failed to load profile. Please try again.
messages.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please sign in again.

dataExport.title: Data Export
dataExport.description: Export your financial data for backup, tax preparation, or analysis in external tools. All exports respect your privacy settings and exclude sensitive information by default.
dataExport.institutionNote: Each export includes the institution names/types you see in the UI, so downstream tools can match transactions and vendors to the same institutions.

bridge.desktop: We will open a native save dialog and write the export directly to your selected folder. Nothing is uploaded to the cloud.
bridge.web: No desktop bridge detected â€” once the export is ready, it will download via your browser instead.

summary.title: Export Summary
summary.success: Data exported successfully! Check your downloads folder.
summary.privacyNoteBody: Exported data includes transaction details but excludes sensitive authentication information. Use exported data responsibly and store it securely.

diagnosticsPanel.title: Diagnostics & Logs
diagnosticsPanel.description: Export recent logs and system context when filing a support ticket, or open the log directory to inspect issues locally.
diagnosticsPanel.notSupported: Diagnostics tooling is only available in the packaged Electron app.

errors.logUnavailable: Log directory access is unavailable in this environment.
errors.exportUnsupported: Diagnostics export is not supported in this environment.

telemetry.noDsn: SENTRY_DSN is not configured. Crash reports stay local even if you opt in.

overall.noData: No financial flow data available for this period
overall.noDataHint: Add income and expense transactions to see the flow diagram

shared.noDataPeriod: No breakdown data available for this period.

income.noAccounts: Add your bank account credentials to automatically track income transactions and get a complete view of your financial flows.
income.noIncomePeriod: No income transactions found for the selected period. Verify your last bank scrape was successful or run a new scrape to update your data.

investment.addLiquidHint: Add brokerage, crypto, or savings accounts
investment.addRestrictedHint: Add pension, provident, or study fund accounts

sankey.title: Financial Flow

scales.logRecommendedHint: Large value differences detected. Consider using logarithmic scale for better visualization.

forecast.scenarioSummary: End of month projection based on {{simulations}} Monte Carlo simulations

budgetForecast.subtitleUnified: One minimalist list: current spend, forecast risk, health, and next steps sorted by risk.

budgetForecast.empty: No active monthly budgets to forecast yet.

header.title: Financial Analysis
header.subtitle: Smart insights, budget tracking, and financial health metrics

hourOfDay.title: Spending by Hour of Day
hourOfDay.subtitle: When do you spend the most money?

weeklyTrend.title: Week-by-Week Spending Trend
weeklyTrend.subtitle: How your spending evolves over time

evolution.title: Spending Evolution
evolution.subtitle: Track your spending trends over time

categoryAverages.title: Average Spending per Category
categoryAverages.subtitle: Weekly and monthly averages by category

makeItReal.title: Make It Real - Time is Money

hoursRequired.title: Hours Required (Top Categories)
hoursRequired.subtitle: How many hours you work for each category

categoryHours.title: All Categories - Cost in Work Hours
categoryHours.subtitle: Visual breakdown of your spending in time

health.title: Financial Health Score
health.subtitle: Comprehensive analysis of your financial wellbeing
health.empty: No health score data available. Please ensure you have sufficient transaction history.

excellent.title: Excellent
excellent.message: Your financial health is in great shape! Keep up the good habits.

good.title: Good
good.message: Your financial health is solid, but there's room for improvement.

needsAttention.title: Needs Attention
needsAttention.message: Your financial health needs some work. Review the recommendations below.

savings.label: Savings
savings.tooltip: Measures your savings rate as a percentage of income. Higher scores indicate better financial discipline and future security.

diversity.label: Diversity
diversity.tooltip: Evaluates how well-balanced your spending is across different categories. A higher score suggests better financial diversification.

impulse.label: Impulse Control
impulse.tooltip: Assesses your ability to control spontaneous purchases. Higher scores indicate better spending discipline and financial planning.

runway.label: Runway
runway.tooltip: Calculates how long your current savings would sustain your lifestyle. Higher scores mean better financial resilience.

metrics.fallbackTooltip: A key indicator of your financial health and stability

smartActions.title: Smart Action Items
smartActions.subtitle: AI-generated insights based on your spending patterns

empty.title: All clear!

budgetHealth.title: Budget Health Monitor
budgetHealth.subtitle: Real-time tracking of your budget performance

empty.title: No Active Budgets Found
empty.instructions: To start tracking your budget health, you need to:

steps.step1: Scroll down to the Budget Suggestions panel below
steps.step2: Click Generate to create AI-powered budget recommendations
steps.step3: Review the suggestions and click Activate Budget on any category
steps.step4: Return here to see real-time budget tracking

alerts.warning: You're at {{percent}}% of your budget with {{days}} days left. Stay on track!
alerts.exceeded: Budget exceeded! Consider adjusting your spending or increasing the limit.

patterns.title: Pattern Matching Rules
patterns.description:
Patterns define which transactions belong to which accounts. Use % as a wildcard.
Example: %deposit% matches any transaction containing "deposit".
